snippet: U.S. lawmakers investigating General Motors' slow recall of 2.6 million cars are zeroing in on engineers and others who may have been aware of problems with ignition switches linked to at least 13 deaths....

headline.print_headline: Congress Turns GM Probe Focus to Engineers, Considers Legislation
headline.main: Congress Turns GM Probe Focus to Engineers, Considers Legislation

lead_paragraph: U.S. lawmakers investigating General Motors' slow recall of 2.6 million cars are zeroing in on engineers and others who may have been aware of problems with ignition switches linked to at least 13 deaths.
